short_summary: National Programs and Business Services requires the services of a consultants to provide both strategic and method oriented insights from key stakeholders and peer review committees to support an assessment of program direction, outcomes, and any needed adjustment.
tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
full_summary:
---

**Notice of Request for Proposal: Business Consulting / Change Management Services**
==========================

**Reference Number**: PW-22-01006271
-------------------------------

**Publication Date**: September 6, 2022
**Tender Closing Date**: September 22, 2022 at 14:00 Eastern Time

**Background**
------------

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) is seeking the services of a consultant to provide strategic and method-oriented insights to support an assessment of program direction, outcomes, and necessary adjustments.

**Objective**
------------

The consultant will be required to:

* Conduct a thorough assessment of the program direction, outcomes, and any needed adjustments.
* Provide strategic and method-oriented insights based on the feedback from key stakeholders and peer review committees.

**Scope of Work**
----------------

The services required include:

* Conducting research and analysis to inform the assessment of program direction and outcomes.
* Developing recommendations for program adjustments, as necessary.
* Providing a final report outlining the findings and recommendations.

**Eligibility Criteria**
----------------------

Eligible consultants must have experience in providing business consulting and change management services, with a focus on strategic planning and implementation.

**Evaluation Criteria**
----------------------

The proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Experience and expertise in providing business consulting and change management services.
* Ability to conduct thorough research and analysis.
* Quality of the proposal, including the methodology and recommendations.

**Procurement Details**
----------------------

* Trade Agreements: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada.
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR).

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For further information, please contact:

* Roxanne Azzi-Abboud
* Email: roxanne.azziabboud@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
* Phone: 613-299-9650

---

**Documentation**
--------------

The tender documents, including the Request for Proposal (RFP), can be found on the [Canada Buys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).

Please note that this contract is expired and no longer open to proposals.
